title: House of Sable Locks
description: From Passionate Plume award finalist Elizabeth Schechter comes a steampunk novel of dark passion. In a respectable neighbourhood, on the top floor of a beautiful house, crouches the Succubus; by design, and by temperament, she is all that men crave and fear. To the wealthy and privileged men of London, the Succubus is a test they must pass to gain access to the House of Sable Locks, the most exclusive brothel in town. However, to William, a wealthy young man born and raised in India, she is the very essence of his desires.  William is recovering from the loss of everything he knows and loves when he first meets the Succubus. With great care she tears him apartâ€¦ and he falls in love again. But their idyll cannot there is a killer loose in London, and the darkness of William's past is about to collide with the terror of his present.  Based on the story "The Succubus" from the acclaimed erotic steampunk anthology Like Clockwork, HOUSE OF SABLE LOCKS lets us enter the mysterious brothel readers previously only had a glimpse of.
author: Elizabeth Schechter
